settings.tooltip.delay: Delay between each action in MS
settings.tooltip.rule34: With this toggle being on, all resources are guaranteed to fit inside one inventory
settings.tooltip.correction: After finishing drawing, if this is on it will automatically check for errors and fix them.
settings.tooltip.correction_mode: Decides how error correction will go
settings.drawing_mode.1: Left to right, top to bottom
settings.drawing_mode.3: Least popular color to most popular
settings.drawing_mode.4: Most popular color to least popular
settings.tooltip.rendering: If you turn this on, you will see preview of your picture in your left upper corner of the screen
settings.tooltip.highlighting: If you turn this on, items, needed for drawing will be highlighted
settings.tooltip.highlighting_color: Color, in which items will be highlighted. (If highlighting is on)
settings.tooltip.depth:
Decides how far image will render
DO NOT CHANGE!
settings.tooltip.height:
Decides how far up image will render
DO NOT CHANGE!
settings.tooltip.sideoff:
Decides how far sideways image will render
DO NOT CHANGE!
settings.tooltip.after:
Toggles some lines of code, just don't touch it
DO NOT CHANGE!
settings.tooltip.debug:
Toggles debug messages in console
DO NOT CHANGE!
drawing.messages.missing: %d is not found, please take this item to inventory to continue. Drawing is now paused.
drawing.messages.id_missing: map ID is not correct, map not found.
drawing.messages.error: Error. Please do not do what you did anymore.
drawing.messages.no_direction: You have to look to some direction,
